text: Tikendrajit Singh, also known as the "Tiger of Manipur", is the crown prince of Manipur kingdom during the modern era. Besides, he was a commander of the Manipuri Army and was the person behind the outbreak of the Anglo-Manipur War of 1891 AD.http://archivesmanipur.nic.in/whoswho.htm#JUBARAJ%20TIKENDRAJIT ==References== Category:People from Manipur Category:History of Manipur Category:1856 births Category:1891 deaths
title: Tikendrajit Singh
